summary.professional_summary: Passionate about web technologies and automation, I develop solutions that transform data into interactive and user-friendly experiences. Co-creator of LinkedIn2CV, a tool that automatically generates professional resumes from LinkedIn profiles.

experiences.title: Web Developer
experiences.description:
Designed and integrated the login page using React and TailwindCSS.
Connected to the LinkedIn API to extract and format user profile data.
Collaborated with a team of 6 developers using GitHub.
Built a responsive and exportable CV template (PDF generation).

experiences.title: Web Development Intern
experiences.description:
Developed analytical dashboards using React and Node.js.
Optimized page loading time by 40%.
Contributed to the redesign of the company’s design system.

experiences.title: University Project - Reservation Management System
experiences.description:
Conducted UML analysis and designed an automated booking system.
Implemented a RESTful architecture for the back-end.

skills.skill_description: React.js, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6), TailwindCSS, Figma
API REST, OAuth Authentication (LinkedIn API), UML Design, Agile Methods
